projects.WYSIWYG: Enhanced CKEditor WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) editor and created server security filters. Programmed featured product for flashcard site monetization.
projects.HTML5 Viewer: Researched and implemented pdf2htmlEX with soffice to convert uploaded essay documents into HTML5 and enhance front-end user experience.
projects.Language Detection: Researched and integrated Google's Compact Language Detector 2 (CLD) library with flashcard site to support Text-To-Speech feature integration.
projects.Solve.com: Built user interface to solve mathematical equations and provide step by step analysis of the solution. Strategized in a team-environment for new beta product.

projects.Web Portals: Developed a custom Joomla content management system (CMS) site to act as the Client and Marketing Staff interface to the company partnered Policy Enterprise software.
projects.ProtegeMex Prototype v2: Implemented a second prototype website ported from v1 adding new features to streamline content updates by Sales Team. Added i18n internationalization, and implemented custom CMS.
projects.ProtegeMex Prototype v1: Prototyped an Insurance Policy Management web app adding a new line of business. A system that allows Customers and Agents to fully manage their insurance policies.
projects.Amazon Cloud Migration: Led migration of legacy servers to Amazon Cloud services reducing server costs by about 40%.
projects.SysAdmin: Was promoted within 2 months to manage local Windows Hyper-V 2008 servers.

projects.Inventory Management: Created a web app to manage general, electronics, and keys inventories streamlining staff operations.
projects.Absence Calendar: Reduced filing errors by creating a web app to track paper form submissions of teacher absences.
projects.Assessment: Provided Admin Staff a streamlined process to collect assessment data on teachers through a custom web app.

projects.Superb Registrar: Increased user retention rates by re-writing workflow logic of existing Domain Registrar web app.

education.title: Bachelor in Computer Science - University of Hawai`i, Manoa
